#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int t,z,n,i,pos,j;
    unsigned long long count,max;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&z);
        unsigned long long a[n];

        for(i=0;i<n;i++) scanf("%llu",&a[i]);
        pos=0;count=a[0];
        for(i=1;i<z;i++) count=count^a[i];
        max=count;
        count=count^a[0];
        //printf("%llu \n",count);
        for(i=z;i<n;i++)
        {
            count=count^a[i];
            if(count<=max)
            {
                max=count;
                pos=i-z+1;
            }
            //printf("%llu \n",count);
            count=count^a[i-z+1];
        }
        printf("%d\n",pos+1);
    }
    return 0;
}
